title: Makar Sankranti
description: Celebrated across different states, marking the conclusion of long winter nights.

title: Vasant Panchami
description: Dedicated to goddess Saraswati, the goddess of wisdom, education, art and culture.

title: Ugadi
description: The Telugu and Kannada New Year.

title: Eid al-Fitr
description: Celebrates the end of Ramadan, the Islamic holy month of fasting.

title: Eid al-Adha
description: Also known as Bakrid, a celebration of sacrifice and faith.

title: Guru Purnima
description: Celebrated to honour one's chosen spiritual teachers or leaders.

title: Raksha Bandhan
description: Celebrates the bond between brothers and sisters.

title: Ganesh Chaturthi
description: Celebrates the birth of Lord Ganesha, especially significant in Maharashtra.

title: Dussehra
description: Celebrates the victory of good over evil, marking the culmination of Navratri.

title: Diwali
description: The festival of lights, symbolizing the victory of light over darkness and good over evil.

title: Christmas
description: Celebrates the birth of Jesus Christ, widely celebrated across India.
